title: Be descriptive. Saying “playing video on YouTube is always choppy” will help us understand the issue better than saying “something is wrong” or “the app is broken”.
content: Be descriptive. Saying “playing video on YouTube is always choppy” will help us understand the issue better than saying “something is wrong” or “the app is broken”.

title: Password said to be incorrect
content:
Prior to today, I've entered my [correct] Firefox primary password several times and it has always been accepted. It worked consistently right up until now, so what gives? And why aren't we simply allowed to reset our primary passwords, since all our browser settings, data, and personal preferences depend on accessing it via the primary password?

In short either send me a reset link, or instructions on how to reset my primary password.

Thank you!
creator: silverdollarcowboy

title: Video playback issues
content: Sometimes, when I try to watch a youtube video, it will not play and sometimes while the video plays, it suddenly turns green and my RAM usage climbs to 100% I cannot refresh the page and have to restart Firefox, but it can still happen again. My graphics drivers are also up to date, so I'm not sure what the issue is.
